org.sakaiproject.sms.api
Interface SmsBilling

public interface SmsBilling

The billing service will handle all financial functions for the sms tool in Sakai.

Version:
1.0
Author:
louis@psybergate.com

Method Summary
 void allocateCredits(int accountID, int creditCount)
          Add extra credits to the specific account by making an entry into SMS_TRANSACTION.
 boolean checkSufficientCredits(int accountID, int creditsRequired)
          Return true of the account has the required credits available.
 double getAccountBalance(int accountID)
          Return the currency amount available in the account.
 int getAccountCredits(int accountID)
          Return credits left in account.
 int getAccountID(java.lang.Integer siteID, java.lang.Integer userID, java.lang.Integer accountType)
          Use Sakai siteID, Sakai userID and account type to get a valid account id.
 void getAccTransactions(int accountID, java.util.Date startDate, java.util.Date endDate)
          Return a list of all transactions between startDate and endDate.
 void getAllSiteAccounts(java.lang.String sakaiSiteID)
          Return all accounts linked to the given Sakai site.
 double getCreditAmount(int creditCount)
          Convert the given credits to currency base on the pre-defined conversion values at the given time.
 void insertAccount(java.lang.String sakaiSiteID)
          Create a new account and return the new account id.
 java.lang.Boolean insertTransaction(int accountID, int transCodeID, int creditAmount)
          Insert a new transaction for the given account id.
 void reserveCredits(int accountID, int credits)
          Insert a new transaction and indicate that the credits are reserved.

reserveCredits

void reserveCredits(int accountID,
                    int credits)
Insert a new transaction and indicate that the credits are reserved. If the request is pending and the administrator delete the request, the reservation must be rolled back.

Parameters:
accountID -
creditAmount -
